name: Bag of Holding
description: A worn, leather pouch with tight drawstrings.
benefit: Benefit. This bag has an interdimensional space inside that can hold up to 10 gear slots.
curse: Curse. Placing this item inside another Bag of Holding or a Portable Hole destroys both items and all held inside them.

name: Boots of the Cat
description: Grey, doeskin boots as thin and soft as slippers.
benefit: Benefit. You can jump up to a near distance from a standstill. Your checks to move silently are always easy (DC 9).

name: Bracers of Defense
description: Steel bracers traced with dwarvish runes of protection.
benefit: Benefit. You get a +1 bonus to your armor class.

name: Brak's Cube of Perfection
description: A tiny cube with paintings of goblins on each face, each one depicting transcendence in a physical or mental trait.
benefit: Benefit. Roll the cube by rolling a d6. Your corresponding stat permanently increases to 18 (+4). 1. Strength. 2. Dexterity. 3. Constitution. 4. Intelligence. 5. Wisdom. 6. Charisma.
additional: After being rolled, Brak's Cube of Perfection teleports to a random location in the multiverse.

name: Cloak of Elvenkind
description: A hooded, billowing cloak that shifts colors to match its surroundings.
benefit: Benefit. Your checks to hide are always easy (DC 9). Once per day, you can become invisible for 5 rounds. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.

name: Gauntlets of Might
description: Heavy, bronze gauntlets with engravings of Herculean giants.
benefit: Benefit. Your Strength stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing these gauntlets.

name: Immovable Rod
description: A short, bejeweled iron rod with a button on one end.
benefit: Benefit. When you click the button, the rod becomes fixed in space. Clicking the button again ends the effect.

name: Jewel of Barbalt
description: A glistening, coconut-sized ruby held in golden claws.
benefit: Benefit. You roll a critical success on an 18-20.
curse: Curse. You roll a critical failure on a 1-3.

name: Kytherian Cog
benefit: Benefit. You start every session with a luck token.

name: Ophidian Armor
description: Glistening, smooth leather of dappled emerald scales.
benefit: Benefit. You have advantage on checks to avoid the effects of poison.

name: Pearl of Power
description: A fat, opalescent pearl glowing with an inner radiance.
benefit: Benefit. Once per day, you may regain the ability to cast a spell you have lost. This cannot restore a spell lost due to a critical spellcasting failure.

name: Potion of Extirpation
description: An acrid, tarry substance in an iron flask with a lead stopper.
benefit: Benefit. You can pour the potion on one object or creature filling up to a close area. The target is utterly removed from reality and cannot be returned by anything short of a wish spell.
personality: Personality. Chaotic. Protests loudly while being used and never agrees that the target is the right choice for extirpation.

name: Potion of Healing
description: A glass bottle with a fizzy, lemon-vanilla liquid inside.
benefit: Benefit. The imbiber of this potion regains hit points based on its level.
additional:
LV 1-3: 1d6 hit points.
LV 4-6: 2d8 hit points.
LV 7-9: 3d10 hit points.
LV 10+: 4d12 hit points.

name: Potion of Invisibility
description: This glass vial appears to be empty, but a liquid audibly splashes around inside it.
benefit: Benefit. When you drink this potion, you become invisible for 10 rounds or until you attack or cast a spell.

name: Scarab of Protection
description: A brooch made from a horned scarab beetle dipped in gold.
benefit: Benefit. If you die, make a DC 18 Constitution check. If you succeed, you are unconscious instead of dead.

name: Shortsword of the Thief
description: A stubby, grey blade riddled with notches and scars.
bonus: Bonus. +1 shortsword. +2 if wielded by a halfling or thief.
benefit: Benefit. Once per day, regain a luck token you just spent.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A knotted, oak stave with a heavy knurl on one end.
benefit: Benefit. Once per day, you can touch a creature with the staff to heal it for 1d6 hit points.

name: Sword of the Ancients
description: A chipped and rusting blade with an oiled leather grip.
benefit: Benefit. The sword is unbreakable and can carve through any material.
additional: The owner can summon the sword to their hand if it's on the same plane.

name: True Name
description: The secret, unique name borne by a creature and documented in The Covenant. Few creatures know their own True Names.
benefit: Benefit. You have advantage on attack rolls and spellcasting checks targeting a creature whose True Name you utter.
